body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Daniel Sanders and the customer's name is Janice Price.  The conversation is about a random business (a Daycare Center ) and is a conversation about billing. The conversation will be synthesized using the tts-1 TTS model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Daniel Sanders, and I am with Sunshine Daycare Center. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Daniel, I'm Janice Price. I have a question about my bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice! I'd be happy to help with your billing question. Could you please confirm your child's name for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my child's name is Emily Price.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice. And can you also provide the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits are five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! Now, regarding your billing inquiry, could you please let me know the month for which you have questions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's for the month of March.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Janice. I see that there was a charge of one hundred twenty-five dollars for Emily's tuition in March. Is that the amount you're inquiring about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that seems higher than what I was expecting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Janice. Let me check to see if there were any additional fees or changes to the usual rate. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time today, Janice. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
